headline: WeatherPromise Closes Oversubscribed Series A Round, Led by Maveron
summary: WeatherPromise, the technology company driving demand for travel, event and recreation companies and redefining how consumers think about weather, today announced the close of its $12.8 million Series A financing, bringing total investment in the company to more than $22 million.

raw.headline: WeatherPromise Closes Oversubscribed Series A Round, Led by Maveron
raw.summary: WeatherPromise, the technology company driving demand for travel, event and recreation companies and redefining how consumers think about weather, today announced the close of its $12.8 million Series A financing, bringing total investment in the company to more than $22 million.

headline: Noble Receives Marriott International Serve360 Award
summary: Noble Investment Group ("Noble") has been honored with the Serve360 Award, one of Marriott International's highest recognitions for partners advancing meaningful social, environmental, and economic impact across the communities they serve.

raw.headline: Noble Receives Marriott International Serve360 Award
raw.summary: Noble Investment Group ("Noble") has been honored with the Serve360 Award, one of Marriott International's highest recognitions for partners advancing meaningful social, environmental, and economic impact across the communities they serve.

headline: Crestline Adds to its Executive Management Team with the Appointment of Orcun Turkay as Vice President of Food & Beverage
summary: FAIRFAX, Va., Jan. 13, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Crestline Hotels & Resorts proudly announces the appointment of Orcun Turkay as Vice President of Food & Beverage, reinforcing its commitment to delivering exceptional dining and entertainment experiences across its rapidly expanding portfolio of lifestyle and full-service hotels. headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock to Keep an Eye On and 2 We Question
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is often seen as a benchmark for strong businesses, but that doesn’t mean every stock is worth owning. Some companies face significant challenges, whether it’s stagnating growth, heavy debt, or disruptive new competitors.

raw.headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock to Keep an Eye On and 2 We Question
